game.name: The Chosen Duck
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, PvP, 스크린 공유 및 분할 PvP, 협동, 스크린 공유 및 분할 협동, 공유 및 분할 화면, 컨트롤러 일부 지원, Remote Play Together, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Welcome to The Chosen Duck. The world that you can be a... Duck! What were you expecting? So, get your ducks in a row, and let's begin our adventure!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Welcome to The Chosen Duck. The world that you can be a... Duck! What were you expecting? So, get your ducks in a row, and let's begin our adventure!
